content: to last 1 stitch k1 round 4 knit all stitches repeat these 4 rnds until a total of 52 rnds have been completed using colour a knit a lateral braid for the complete round see notes on page 2 repeat these two sections until 8 sections have been completed sections 4 and 8 are to be knit in colour a knit section 6 in colour b bind off 110 stitches using preferred stretchy bind off method weave in ends and block as desired joining the two ends line the two ends up evenly and using a crochet hook and colour a attach the two ends with double_crochet along the finished edges hook the needle through both sides of the join to close the gap the double_crochet will form a ridge similar to the lateral braid pattern copyright©thecolourfulknit 2019 all rights reserved page 3 of 3
